title: Dragonfire
description: Leilani Aster and her sister are the last of the descendants of a powerful Druid. When an old, brutal enemy is determined to destroy them, Lani must call upon her ex-lover, Aleksandar Lyaksandro--the mighty leader of the shapeshifting Dragon Order--for help. But Aleksander had betrayed Lani once before. Can she really trust the man who had broken her heart in order to keep the Druid's safe? And Aleksander must overcome the doubts of the past and learn to love, once and for all. Can Lani and Aleksander finally accept that love is the greatest power of all, especially in time to save their lives?
